DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study compare change blood carotene concentration food-based versus nutritional supplement-based intervention . This study randomize 60 healthy volunteer receive either carotenoid-enriched food ; natural , mixed carotenoid supplementation ; chlorophyll complex placebo supplementation . Blood carotene level measure 28 day supplementation . Preliminary data also collect several biomarkers associate vascular inflammation endothelial dysfunction . These biomarkers measure fast food control meal begin end intervention period .
DOC.criteria: adult age 1865 good health absence exclusion criterion standardize medical history interview willingness randomize willingness complete multiple blood draw follow fast food consumption two occasion 28 day child < 18 year current use carotenoid supplement ( include typical multivitamin contain betacarotene ) current use polyphenol supplement include green tea , resveratrol , pine bark extract , cocoa , and/or grape skin extract current use aspirin , statins regular ( > 2 per week ) use NSAID medication current smoking past smoking great 3 pack total currently live smoker excessive alcohol intake ( > 3 drink per day ) history alcoholism know exposure asbestos autoimmune disease hemachromatosis history gallbladder disease include gall stone gall bladder removal prediabetes , metabolic syndrome diabetes ( 1 2 ) establish cardiovascular disease ( arrhythmia , heart failure , hypertension treatment untreated stage II hypertension ( ≥160/90 ; stage II technically diastolic ≥100mmHg , maintain diastolic cutoff 90mmHg ) , past MI stroke ) renal liver disease ( viral hepatitis , nonalcoholic steatohepatitis `` fatty liver '' ) acute infection except viral cold residual injury/pain/limitation trauma chronic musculoskeletal disorder include osteoarthritis require pain medication psychiatric disorder would impair completion research task allergy supply food anyone medicallyprescribed diet > 3.5 serving fruits/veggies per day inability consume entire study Control meal w/in specify timeline ( 30 minute ) current pregnancy breast feeding refusal participate blood draw follow control meal .
